Transparent Pricing

Simple, Honest Pool Service Pricing

Our pricing is designed to be straightforward and fair. Pool service costs are based on the size of your pool, the condition of the water, and the level of care required to keep everything clean, balanced, and running properly.

We focus on consistent weekly maintenance to prevent costly problems before they start — helping you protect your pool and avoid surprise repairs.

✔ No long-term contracts
✔ Clear monthly pricing ranges
✔ Service explained upfront
[/et_pb_fullwidth_code][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.27.5" _module_preset="default" global_colors_info="{}"][et_pb_fullwidth_code admin_label="🧾 2. What’s Included in Weekly Service

Our weekly service is designed to protect your investment, maintain water quality, and ensure your pool stays consistently clean — without surprises or shortcuts.

✓
Thorough skimming of leaves and surface debris
✓
Professional water testing and precise chemical balancing
✓
Vacuuming as needed to maintain floor cleanliness
✓
Pump, filter, and circulation performance checks
✓
Emptying and cleaning skimmer & pump baskets
✓
Visual inspection of equipment during every visit
[/et_pb_fullwidth_code][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.27.5" _module_preset="default" global_colors_info="{}"][et_pb_fullwidth_code admin_label="🧠 4. What’s Included (clarity = conversions)" _builder_version="4.27.5" _module_preset="default" global_colors_info="{}"]

Ready to Lock In Reliable Pool Service?

No contracts. No surprises. Just dependable weekly pool care, crystal-clear water, and a local technician who shows up. Call today and we’ll walk you through exact pricing.

Call for Pricing: (661) 498-4444 Request a Free Quote
[/et_pb_fullwidth_code][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.27.5" _module_preset="default" global_colors_info="{}"][et_pb_fullwidth_code admin_label="🧩 3. Why Prices Vary (helps pre-handle objections)" _builder_version="4.27.5" _module_preset="default" global_colors_info="{}"]
Pricing Transparency

Why Prices May Vary

Pool service pricing depends on factors such as pool size, shape, debris levels, equipment complexity, and service frequency — especially in hot, windy climates like the Antelope Valley.

Custom services like tile cleaning, salt system checks, or advanced chemical adjustments may affect pricing, but our team always explains costs clearly before any work begins.

[/et_pb_fullwidth_code][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built="1" fullwidth="on" _builder_version="4.27.5" _module_preset="default" global_colors_info="{}"][et_pb_fullwidth_code admin_label="🧠 4. What’s Included (clarity = conversions)" _builder_version="4.27.5" _module_preset="default" global_colors_info="{}"]

Pool Cleaning Pricing FAQs

We believe pricing should be clear and straightforward. Here are the most common questions homeowners ask before getting started.

How much does weekly pool service cost?

Pricing depends on pool size, condition, and service needs. Most residential pools fall within a standard weekly range. Call us for an exact quote — no pressure, no surprises.

Are chemicals included in the price?

Yes. Our weekly service includes professional water testing and chemical balancing to keep your pool safe, clear, and comfortable.

Do you require a contract?

No contracts required. We earn your business through reliable service and consistent results — not long-term lock-ins.

Is green pool cleanup priced differently?

Yes. Green or severely cloudy pools require additional time and treatment. We’ll assess the condition and provide a clear one-time recovery price.

What areas do you service?

We service Palmdale, Lancaster, Quartz Hill, Rosamond, Lake Los Angeles, and surrounding Antelope Valley areas.

How quickly can service start?

In most cases, we can start service within a few days. Call us and we’ll confirm availability and your weekly service day.

[/et_pb_fullwidth_code][et_pb_fullwidth_code admin_label="🧠 4. What’s Included (clarity = conversions)" _builder_version="4.27.5" _module_preset="default" global_colors_info="{}"][/et_pb_fullwidth_code][/et_pb_section]
